channel.title: Lily H. Zhang
channel.description: Recent content on Lily H. Zhang

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m a PhD student at New York University and am very lucky to be advised by Professors Rajesh Ranganath and Kyle Cranmer. I’m interested in deep learning, probabilistic modeling, and improving robustness and generalization of machine learning algorithms. I’m grateful to be a DeepMind scholar.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Conference Papers Lily H. Zhang, Mark Goldstein, Rajesh Ranganath. “Understanding Failures in Out-of-distribution Detection with Deep Generative Models.” ICML, 2021. Workshop Papers Lily H. Zhang, Mark Goldstein, Rajesh Ranganath. “Understanding Out-of-distribution Detection with Deep Generative Models.” ICLR RobustML Workshop, 2021. Lily H. Zhang, Michael C. Hughes. “Rapid Model Comparison by Amortizing Across Models.” Proceedings of The 2nd Symposium on Advances in Approximate Bayesian Inference, 2020.
